list_definition.definition: a machine for making water pump rise from under the ground

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Every village used to have a pump from which everyone drew their water.

list_definition.definition: a machine or device for forcing liquid or gas into, or out of, something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a bicycle pump (for forcing air into the tyres/tires).

list_definition.definition: to raise or force with a pump

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Oil is being pumped out of the ground.

list_definition.definition: to get information from by asking questions

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He tried to pump me about the exam.
